posts.post_content:
Greetings gents.  I am looking to purchase a VGish or lower grade T207 Hooper, a Hoff too actually.

Eye appeal is important to me.  I would prefer not to have significant creasing through the player's face.

I can buy them outright or trade for them should you elect to.  My "trade bait" gallery can be seen by clicking my user name.  There are T206s in there for you T206 fiends.

Please PM me should you have anything available.  Thanks.  :)
